Besch

I make techno music using code and synthesizers.

Besch

Bechir Mrad

BIO


Besch is a live-coder and co-founder of Actitude collective, and Algorave collective in Berlin. He is fueled by an insatiable curiosity for sound exploration and a deep-rooted love for music.

What sets him apart is his unique approach of blending his passion for coding combined with synths and organic sounds. This fusion of music and technology has become his signature style.
